com.inamik.template
Class AbstractTemplateActionTag

java.lang.Object
  com.inamik.template.AbstractTemplateActionTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
TemplateActionTag
Direct Known Subclasses:
Capture, Else, ElseIf, ElseUnless, Foreach, If, Include, Macro, NewLine, Print, Set, Text, Trim, Unless, Unset, Until, While
public abstract class AbstractTemplateActionTag
extends java.lang.Object
implements TemplateActionTag

AbstractTemplateActionTag - Base class for action tags.

Implements default versions of all interface methods.

All of the execute() method just throw IllegalStateException, as they should never be called. Your class must override the appropriate execute() method for the action's parmType.

Similarly, afterBody(TemplateMacro) also throws an IllegalStateException.

Created on Jul 9, 2006

Author:
Dave
See Also:
TemplateActionTag

afterBody

public TemplateActionTag.AfterBodyResult afterBody(TemplateMacro macro)
                                            throws TemplateActionException
afterBody w/TemplateMacro - Just throws IllegalStateException, as it should never be called.

If your action has parmType="macro", then you must want to do something with that macro, so do it.

Specified by:
afterBody in interface TemplateActionTag
Throws:
TemplateActionException
See Also:
